title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message:
Just received a new Medusa 2 and its worked great on newer usb c macbooks however I cant get it to read chips on 820-00165 or 820-3437 boards. Tried with the board off nothing connected, the battery only connected and only a/c adapter connected. Also tried with both a/c adapter and battery connected.

What is the correct way to read the bios chip on these?

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: Only charger; connect Medusa adapter on J6100 after the charger is plugged in.

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: Medusa still  says no chip even with just the charger?

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message:
You MUST insert Medusa adapter on J6100, after Mac is powered up from charger.
Did you do that?

Also be sure J6100 is clean.

Better result if you let charger disconnected and inject external 3V into 3V3_SUS.

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: Yes and as soon as the Medusa is inserted into J6100 the boards powers itself off and Medusa just says no chip seen.

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: Solved. Works only with red adapter, not the yellow one.

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: Do you have to do anything different with the 820-3437? Trying the same procedure but the Medusa cant see the chip on these

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message:
"Better result if you let charger disconnected and inject external 3V into 3V3_SUS."
I don't work in other way since a year...

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message: While injecting 3v into pad 2 of R8133 the medusa still says no chip seen (H). 3V3_SUS does read 3v on pin 2 of U8130. What am I missing?

title: medusa 2 read bios 820-00165
message:
Maybe bad chip, traces?
Did you try with other 3437 board?
Remove the chip and use A4064 adapter.

Also can be corrosion underneath J6100...
